resources.string: Zoloto je novoosnovana stranica koja nudi proizvode izrađene od poludragog kamenja. S radom smo započeli tijekom studenoga 2020.godine, a do ideje smo došli istražujući osobitosti poludragog kamenja. Svaki od kamena ima svoje specifičnosti koje na tijelo utječu i mentalno i fizički. Kako vrijeme odmiče, trudimo se ponuditi što više novih proizvoda.

"Oblikuje ambicije, duhovne i materijalne, i pomaže da ih ostvarite."

string-array.name: lijepePoruke
string-array.item: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything – anger, anxiety, or possessions – we cannot be free.
Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
Smile often, think positively, give thanks, laugh loudly, love others, dream big.
Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
Stay positive, work hard, and make it happen.

I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn’t arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I’m going to be happy in it.
Kindness is a wonderful way to let another struggling soul know that there is still love in this world.
Stay positive, work hard, and make it happen.
Whoever is happy will make others happy.
Be kinder to yourself and then let your kindness flood the world.
The darkest nights produce the brightest stars.
Im choosing happiness over suffering, I know I am. I’m making space for the unknown future to fill up my life with yet-to-come surprises.
Happiness is not the absence of problems it’s the ability to deal with them.
It is okay to STOP and just BE.
Hey little fighter, soon things will be brighter.
Regardless of how anyone else feels about me, I am going to choose to be happy and completely love myself today.
I am in charge of how I feel and today I am choosing happiness.
